BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.RAM.asyncRam#
BlackBox.type:
asyncRam#
  :: HasCallStack      -- ARG[0]
  => Clock wdom wgated -- ^ wclk, ARG[1]
  -> Clock rdom rgated -- ^ rclk, ARG[2]
  -> SNat n            -- ^ sz,   ARG[3]
  -> Signal rdom Int   -- ^ rd,   ARG[4]
  -> Signal wdom Bool  -- ^ en,   ARG[5]
  -> Signal wdom Int   -- ^ wr,   ARG[6]
  -> Signal wdom a     -- ^ din,  ARG[7]
  -> Signal rdom a
